name: status-tools
description: Tools for manipulating Chrome status data

scripts.csv: npm run clean && npm run json && json2csv -i features.json -f category,name,comments,browsers.chrome.status.text,browsers.chrome.status.milestone_str,browsers.chrome.owners,browsers.chrome.origintrial,browsers.chrome.blink_components,browsers.chrome.flag,browsers.chrome.bug,browsers.chrome.intervention,browsers.chrome.opera,summary,id,resources -o features.csv -F -d $

author: Joseph Medley
